document_data.name: Eschar
document_data.mainbody: '''Eschar''' was a powerful [[demon]] bound by the [[Nar demonbinder]]s of [[Narfell]] beneath [[Dun-Tharos]] to guard the [[Sighing Vault]].{{cite book/Lady of Poison|195-200|19}}
document_data.Description: Eschar resembled an immense [[ogre]] with red skin and a crown of horns. He spoke with a brutish, hollow voice. His skin was scaled, and his horns radiated with fiendish witchlight; his body pulsed with evil power.
document_data.Personality: Unlike other demons, Eschar actually relished the conditions of his binding. He was still bloodthirsty, ferocious, and proud.
document_data.Abilities: Eschar was mainly a physical fighter, swinging fists and clawed feet. He commanded other demons, being able to freeze even the servants of the [[Queen Abiding]] by commanding them. He was also capable of teleporting himself from place to place, even outside of the Sighing Vault from time to time.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|224-225|23}}
document_data.Activities: Until 1373 DR, Eschar guarded the [[Sighing Vault]] in Dun-Tharos, particularly from the servants of the [[Queen Abiding]], but he did not do so very closely. He remained in Dun-Tharos after it was breached.
document_data.Relationships: Other demons similar to Eschar, but smaller and misshapen, were in Dun-Tharos close to his location.{{cite book/Lady of Poison|190-193|19}}
